recipe.letter: Greetings, young adept.^My sources tell me you've been hunting a variety of the fell beings we call 'monsters'.^If you're after their loot, I recently found a way to replicate those using an arcane table.^Just place the object on the table for a moment and take it back. You should feel the power at once.^Here is how to craft the table. Use it wisely.^ -M. Rasmodius, Wizard
recipe.letter.title: Wizard's Arcane Table
